descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jayson Tatum passes one in the paint to Robert Williams III for a 2-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum's sweet dish to Williams sets up a nice bucket) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum's sweet dish to Williams sets up a nice bucket

videos.description: Jayson Tatum gets the and-1 to fall

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jayson Tatum gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jayson Tatum gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Jayson Tatum whips pass to Derrick White, who cans the 3-pointer right before the first quarter ends.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (White splashes 3 before first-quarter buzzer) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: White splashes 3 before first-quarter buzzer

videos.description: Killian Hayes loses the defender with a nice crossover, then dishes it to Rodney McGruder for the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hayes loses defender with crossover, finds McGruder for 3) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hayes loses defender with crossover, finds McGruder for 3

videos.description: Hamidou Diallo is ejected after being called for a hostile act on an official.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Diallo ejected after controversial call for pushing an official) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Diallo ejected after controversial call for pushing an official

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart and Marcus Smart have to be pulled away from each other after the two battle for a rebound.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Smart, Stewart have to be separated after fighting for rebound) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Smart, Stewart have to be separated after fighting for rebound

videos.description: Jaylen Brown shows off the post moves for slick jumper in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jaylen Brown spins off defender for smooth jumper) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jaylen Brown spins off defender for smooth jumper

videos.description: Jaylen Brown puts in the tough basket for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jaylen Brown fired up after and-1) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jaylen Brown fired up after and-1

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart denies Jaylen Brown's dunk attempt leading to Jerami Grant cramming home the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grant follows the Stewart block with a jam) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Grant follows the Stewart block with a jam

videos.description: Payton Pritchard sheds Marvin Bagley III with a crossover and knocks down the jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Pritchard snatches Bagley’s ankles before hitting jumper) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pritchard snatches Bagley's ankles before hitting jumper

videos.description: Marcus Smart makes a sweet pass to Payton Pritchard who misses the open layup, but grabs his own rebound and finds Jayson Tatum for the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Pritchard’s blown layup ends up with a Tatum 3) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pritchard's blown layup ends up with a Tatum 3

videos.description: Cade Cunningham with the and-1 bucket

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham with the and-1 bucket) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham with the and-1 bucket

videos.description: Jayson Tatum gets the dunk on the broken play, then Payton Pritchard finishes the layup off the steal to seal a Celtics win.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum’s dunk, Pritchard’s layup ice game for Celtics) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum's dunk, Pritchard's layup ice game for Celtics
